headline.main: Somalia: 110 Dead From Hunger in Past 48 Hours in Drought
headline.print_headline: Somalia: 110 Dead From Hunger in Past 48 Hours in Drought

lead_paragraph: Somalia's prime minister said Saturday that 110 people have died from hunger in the past 48 hours in a single region — the first death toll announced in a severe drought threatening millions of people across the country.
snippet: Somalia's prime minister said Saturday that 110 people have died from hunger in the past 48 hours in a single region — the first death toll announced in a severe drought threatening millions of people across the country....
